hjb.jms
Class HJBProvider

java.lang.Object
  hjb.jms.HJBProvider
public class HJBProvider
extends Object

HJBProvider represents a JMS Provider registered with HJB.

Author:
Tim Emiola

Field Detail

HJB_PROVIDER_NAME

public static String HJB_PROVIDER_NAME
Constant that holds the environment property for specifying the name of the provider in the hjb resource hierarchy.

The value of this constant is "hjb.provider.name".

equals

public boolean equals(Object obj)
Providers are considered to be equivalent if their environments are the same. HJBRoot ensures that names are always different, so these are not included in the comparison.

Returns:
true if the Provider have the same environments

hashCode

public int hashCode()
In accordance with rules in Object.hashCode(), this is overridden to be consistent with equals(Object).

Returns:
a hashCode consistent with the Provider.equals(Object)
